name: BlastarVR(Hand Tracking)
summary:
Welcome to the magnificent universe!  

In this game, you will confront various monsters in different vibrant cosmic settings!  The game creator, being a fan of Elon Musk, has incorporated elements related to the idol.  Welcome fellow Elon fans to appreciate together! 

In the face of colossal creatures scattered throughout the vast universe, unleash your array of hand gesture-recognized weapons and engage in exhilarating battles!  Victory shall belong to the brave warriors!  

In the game, you have...
